snippet.title: Shattered Heaven - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Shattered Heaven is a dark fantasy deck builder with RPG elements and a branching narrative that invites adventurers to explore its dangerous dungeons. Explore twisting dungeons full of mysterious monsters and deadly traps by assembling a party of capable heroes. Bolster the party’s strength by building fully customizable decks full of active abilities and passive skills. Follow a complex, twisting narrative with each trip into the shifting Naraka dungeons, facing foes in challenging, turn-based battles. Overcome myriad trials, experiment over multiple runs, and claim victory in the War of the Ascension.

Shattered Heaven is launching in Steam Early Access on April 19.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #ShatteredHeaven
